Player History
Had first career hit on 6/5/1980, off Toby Hay (LYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/5/1980, off Isaac Balderrama (LYN)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Troy, driving in 4 runs on 8/8/1980...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Lynchburg on 8/31/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1985, hitting .579 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Lynchburg on 7/19/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1986, hitting .615 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/6/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1989, hitting .522 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Syracuse to Ashburn on 2/12/1990 (Going to SYR: RF T. Peoples. Going to Ash: CF I. Kempton, 1B M. Pagan, 2B S. Synder)...
Traded from Ashburn to Bay City on 5/31/1991 (Going to BC: CF I. Kempton. Going to Ash: P D. Castrejon, 1B W. Heeter)...
Injured on 6/1/1991 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
